name: gmail-colored-rows
body:
![Gmail Colored Rows](https://github.com/feralou/Gmail-Colored-rows/blob/master/screenshoots/gmail_full.png?raw=true)

This extension highlights each email row with the color of its tag.

![Gmail Colored Rows](https://github.com/feralou/Gmail-Colored-rows/blob/master/screenshoots/gmail_promo.png?raw=true)

How to install:

[Download from here](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ogflnldhnldpbdbjejnkhgoebigggogo)

![Gmail Colored Rows](https://github.com/feralou/Gmail-Colored-rows/blob/master/screenshoots/steep_1.png?raw=true)

![Gmail Colored Rows](https://github.com/feralou/Gmail-Colored-rows/blob/master/screenshoots/steep_2.png?raw=true)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
